rules_text: Each Treefolk, Plant, and Fortification card in your hand without plot has plot. Its plot cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}. [i](You may pay its plot cost and exile it from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The difference between planting you farm and planning your future is infinitesimal.[/i]
